title: About 151 GW renewable capacity under implementation in India: Minister Pralhad Joshi
description: Union Minister Pralhad Joshi announced that 151 GW of renewable energy projects are under various stages of implementation in India, with 76.42 GW expected to be operationalized within 3-4 years. Renewable energy capacity has soared to over 195 GW as of June 2024, driven by significant increases in solar and wind power capacities.
